content: MECCA, Saudi Arabia (AP) — Muslim pilgrims have been streaming into Saudi Arabia's holy city of Mecca ahead of the start of the Hajj later this week, as the annual pilgrimage returns to its monumental scale. title: PennDOT driver license, photo centers to be closed for Juneteenth holiday
content: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) has announced that all driver’s license and photo centers, including its full-service center in Harrisburg, will be closed Wednesday, June 19, in observance of the Juneteenth holiday. June 19, known as Juneteenth National Freedom Day, is an official annual observance in Pennsylvania. Juneteenth marks June 19, 1865, when Union soldiers reached Galveston, Texas – the furthest point in the South — with news of the end of the Civil War....

title: After Xbox made several of its games multiplatform, PlayStation is putting its own IP on Nintendo for the first time in 26 years with Lego Horizon Adventures

content: Bucking a 26-year-old trend, PlayStation is releasing one of its own IP, Lego Horizon Adventures, on rival console Nintendo Switch. title: Microsoft backs up Geoff Keighley after he ignited console warrior outrage over the Gears of War: E-Day trailer
content: Over the weekend, ubiquitous gaming event producer and host Geoff Keighley tweeted about the surprise reveal of Gears of War: E-day that closed out the Xbox Games Showcase. "The great Gears of War piece was a CG from Blur Studio," Keighley said , "using in-game assets from UE5." Now, you might read that tweet and think, as I did, that it was an innocuous attempt to provide additional context for a cool trailer. That's because you and I are reasonable people. title: He rambled to reporters after a downtown Atlanta shooting. Then, police say, he hijacked a bus

content: Después de haber existido durante más de un siglo, las casetas telefónicas desaparecen lentamente frente a la era tecnológica. title: James “Jim” Raymond

content: హైదరాబాద్‌, జూన్‌ 12 (నమస్తే తెలంగాణ): భారతీయ న్యాయ వ్యవస్థలో సమూల మార్పులు తీసుకొచ్చేందుకు కేంద్ర ప్రభుత్వం ప్రవేశపెట్టిన భారతీయ న్యాయ సంహిత-2023, భారతీయ నాగరిక్‌ సురక్ష సంహిత-2023, భారతీయ సంహిత-2023 చట్టాల అమలును నిలిపివేయాలని బీఆర్‌ఎస్‌ నేత, మాజీ ఎంపీ వినోద్‌కుమార్‌ డిమాండ్‌ చేశారు. ఈ మూడు చట్టాలను జూలై 1 నుంచి అమలు చేయాలన్న నిర్ణయాన్ని నిలిపివేయకపోతే కోర్టును ఆశ్రయిస్తానని స్పష్టంచేశారు. ఈ మేరకు బుధవారం ఆయన కేంద్ర హోంశాఖ మంత్రి అమిత్‌షా, న్యాయ శాఖ మంత్రి అర్జున్‌రామ్‌ మేఘ్వాల్‌కు లేఖలు...

content: (CNN) -- El presidente de Estados Unidos, Joe Biden, llegará a la cumbre del G7 en Italia con más de 300 nuevas sanciones destinadas a aislar aún más y debilitar financieramente a Rusia. title: Motobomba explotó en Colombia y dejó seis heridos (+videos)
creator: Fabiana Dos Reis
content: Una motobomba explotó este miércoles en pleno centro del municipio colombiano de Jamundí (Valle del Cauca) y dejó seis personas heridas, según recoge Caracol Radio. title: Lobalu Europameister über 10'000 m
creator: Agentur sda
content: Es war für die Schweiz bereits die neunte Medaille in Rom, die vierte goldene. Zuvor hatte es an Europameisterschaften nie mehr als sechs Podestplätze gegeben. In einem Rennen, in dem lange gebummelt wurde, weshalb Lobalu selber zwischendurch für Tempo sorgte, hatte er auf den letzten 400 m die besten Beine, was nicht von ungefähr kam, da er viel dafür investiert hatte. title: Monaco sacré champion de France après sa large victoire sur Paris
creator: Olivier Paquereau
content: Monaco est de nouveau champion de France, pour la deuxième année d'affilée. Mercredi à l'Adidas Arena de Paris, le club monégasque a écrasé le Paris Basketball (115-76) lors du match 4 de la finale. Il menait 19-0 au bout de cinq minutes de jeu. Les Parisiens n'ont jamais pu combler un tel retard. Par trois victoires à une, Monaco a remporté la finale de Betclic Élite. Mike James a inscrit 27 points et Elie Okobo, 23.

title: Collision organizers to bring North American version of Web Summit conference to B.C.
creator: The Canadian Press
content: VANCOUVER - Global technology conference Web Summit is headed to Vancouver next May with a new North American iteration of the event. Other versions of Web Summit have taken place in Portugal, Brazil and Qatar and the same organizers are behind the Rise conference in Asia and the Collision event Toronto has hosted since 2019. Organizers say Web Summit Vancouver will take the place of Collision, which is being held in Toronto next week. They did not immediately respond to a request for comment...

title: TFF'den İrfan Can Kahveci açıklaması
content: Türkiye Futbol Federasyonu, Polonya ile oynanan hazırlık maçında sakatlık yaşayan İrfan Can Kahveci'nin sağlık durumu hakkında açıklama yaptı. TFF'den yapılan açıklama şu şekilde: "A Millî Takımımızın EURO 2024 kadrosunda bulunan oyunculardan İrfan Can Kahveci ’nin Polonya ile oynanan özel maçın ilk yarısında yaşamış olduğu sakatlıkla ilgili tedavisi devam etmektedir. Millî futbolcumuzun sağlık durumu günlük olarak takip edilecektir."

title: Σεισμική δόνηση στη Ναύπακτο
content: Σεισμική δόνηση έγινε αισθητή σε Αχαΐα και Αιτωλοακαρνανία στις 23:05. Σύμφωνα με την αναθεωρημένη λύση του Γεωδυναμικού Ινστιτούτου, η σεισμική δόνηση είχε μέγεθος 3,7 βαθμούς της κλίμακας Ρίχτερ. Το επίκεντρο υπολογίστηκε τέσσερα χιλιόμετρα δυτικά της Ναυπάκτου ενώ το εστιακό βάθος προσδιορίζεται στα 16 χλμ. Λιγότερο από μία ώρα νωρίτερα, στις 22.19 σεισμός είχε ταρακουνήσει και τη Ρόδο με μέγεθος 4.9 Ρίχτερ. Καθησυχαστικός εμφανίστηκε ο σεισμολόγος...

title: 4 people, including 2 children, dead in apparent murder-suicide in Colorado, authorities say
creator: The Associated Press
content: DENVER (AP) — Four people, including two children, were shot and killed in an apparent murder-suicide late Tuesday in a small city in southeastern Colorado, authorities said. Two adults and two children were found shot in a home in La Junta, city of about 7,100 people in a farming and ranching area about 175 miles (282 kilometers) southeast of Denver, the Colorado Bureau of Investigations said Wednesday. title: Comisión de Fiscalización volverá a citar al gobernador regional de Pasco para el viernes 14
Le relais 4x100 m femmes en argent lors des Championnats d'Europe derrière la Grande-Bretagne
creator: Stéphane Kohler
content: Il y aura une seule médaille française en relais lors de ces Championnats d'Europe, et elle est en argent, grâce aux filles du 4x100 m. Deuxièmes derrière la Grande-Bretagne (41''91) de Dina Asher-Smith, Orlann Olière, Gémima Joseph, Hélène Parisot et Sarah Richard ont couru en 42''15 et devancent les Pays-Bas (42''46) grâce à des transmissions propres et un superbe virage de Parisot. C'est d'ailleurs la deuxième médaille sur ce rendez-vous continental pour .

title: Trial starts for ex-N.J. state trooper accused of obstructing police on Jan. 6
content: Michael Daniele, a retired New Jersey State Police trooper, went on trial in federal court Wednesday in Washington, D.C. on charges he interfered with police officers during the Jan. 6, 2021 rioting at the U.S. Capitol. The Holmdel resident has chosen a bench trial, where the judge acts as jury, before Judge Amit P. Mehta. Daniele is charged with six crimes, including two counts of obstructing officers during a civil disorder, acting disorderly and entering a restricted Capitol building....

title: El ADN revela el misterio de los niños sacrificados en Chichén Itzá
creator: Andrés Tudares
content: En 1967, durante la construcción de una pista de aterrizaje cerca de la mítica ciudad maya de Chichén Itzá en Yucatán, México, los obreros descubrieron una cavidad subterránea llena de huesos humanos. Esta cueva, destruida poco después del hallazgo, contenía restos que plantearon uno de los mayores enigmas sobre la cultura maya: ¿quiénes eran las más de 100 víctimas y por qué fueron sacrificadas? title: Aldon Drewes
content: July 20, 1944 - June 11, 2024 DETROIT LAKES, Minn. - Aldon Drewes, 79, Detroit Lakes, Minn., died Tuesday, June 11, in his home. title: Biden nominates St. Cloud native Laura Provinzino to serve as federal judge in Minnesota
creator: Estelle Timar-Wilcox / MPR News
content: President Joe Biden has nominated Laura Provinzino to serve as Minnesota’s next federal judge. Provinzino, a St. Cloud native, is a prosecutor in the U.S. Attorney’s Office for Minnesota. title: Mirzapur News: फंदे से लटककर युवक ने दी जान

title: رفض دعوى عدم دستورية امتداد عقد الإيجار لورثة المستأجر
content: قضت المحكمة الدستورية العليا برئاسة المستشار بولس فهمى، بعدم قبول الدعوى المطالبة، بعدم دستورية الفقرة الثانية من المادة الخامسة من القانون 6 لسنة 1997 بشأن إيجار الأماكن. وطالبت الدعوى الدستورية التي حملت رقم 182 لسنة 20، بعدم دستورية الفقرة الثانية من المادة الخامسة من القانون 6 لسنة 1997 بشأن إيجار الأماكن. وتنص المادة الخامسة من القانون 6 لسنة 1997 الخاص بـ إيجار الاماكن غير السكنية على أن: ينشر هذا القانون في الجريدة الرسمية، ويعمل به من اليوم التالي لتاريخ نشره، "عدا الفقرة...

title: How Taylor Swift fans are exchanging secret messages with homemade friendship bracelets during UK Eras Tour
creator: Julia Atherley
content: ON the train to Edinburgh last week for Taylor Swift’s first UK show of The Eras Tour, a little girl in sparkly cowboy boots handed me a friendship bracelet. She was there with her parents and older sister, having begged her school for an early finish so she could make it to the stadium in time. It wasn’t hard for her to spot a fellow Swiftie on the way to the Scottish capital’s Murrayfield Stadium, we were the ones in glitter taking up the carriage. I told her I felt bad because I didn’t have...

title: مئات التظاهرين بمحيط وزارة الدفاع الإسرائيلية.. ومطالبات بإبرام صفقة تبادل فورية
content: أفادت قناة «القاهرة الإخبارية»، في نبأ عاجل، نقلا عن إعلام عبري، بأن مئات المتظاهرين يغلقون شارعًا قبالة وزارة الدفاع الإسرائيلية في تل أبيب، مطالبين بإبرام صفقة تبادل فورًا. كما ذكرت مصادر إعلامية إسرائيلية اندلاع حريق في منطقة أفيفيم بالجليل الأعلى نتيجة سقوط صاروخ مضاد للدروع.

title: Μέσι: «Η Ίντερ Μαϊάμι θα είναι η τελευταία ομάδα της καριέρας μου»

title: X, ex-Twitter, oculta curtidas após liberar pornografia na plataforma
content: O X , antigo Twitter, anunciou nesta semana que as curtidas (likes) em posts de outros usuários não serão mais visíveis publicamente . A atualização, que já está em vigor para todos os perfis, incluindo assinantes do X Premium, visa garantir mais privacidade aos utilizadores, de acordo com comunicado da equipe de engenharia da rede social nesta terça-feira, 11. A aba Curtidas nos perfis, que exibia aos seguidores e visitantes os posts que um usuário havia curtido, foi removida ....

title: Parents taking children to Walt Disney World acquire nearly $2K in debt, study shows
creator: Iman Palm
content: by: Iman Palm Posted: Jun 12, 2024 / 01:54 PM PDT Updated: Jun 12, 2024 / 01:58 PM PDT More travelers are seemingly taking on debt to afford a trip to Walt Disney World in Orlando, Florida, according to a new study from Lending Tree. The financial website surveyed over 2,000 U.S. consumers and found that 45% of parents taking their children under 18 to the theme park resort have taken on Disney-related debt. That’s a 33% increase from 2022 , when only 18% of survey respondents acquired such...

title: Council deadlocked on location for West Kelowna hygiene centre (West Kelowna)
content: Photo: Wayne Moore/file West Kelowna council will wait before making a decision on a location for a proposed resource hygiene centre . Council found themselves deadlocked on whether to defer a decision outright or direct staff to work with agencies proposing the hygiene centre. With Mayor Gord Milsom absent from Tuesday’s council meeting, the remaining six councillors were unable to come to a consensus. Councillors Johnston, de Jong and Millsap voted against the original motion and in favour of...

title: Tragedija u Srbiji: U dvorištu je tijekom igre poginulo dijete
creator: Ivan Štengl
content: U srpskom selu Draževiće, nedaleko Sjenice, u srijedu je tijekom igre poginulo trogodišnje dijete, piše Kurir . Prema neslužbenim informacijama dijete je poginulo u dvorištu prilikom igre. Hitna i policija stigle su brzo na mjesto nesreće, ali nesretnom dječaku nije bilo pomoći.

content: Más de 10 proyectos similares se habían hundido en trámite legislativo en legislaturas pasadas , esta iniciativa logró superar todos los debates en parte debido a que únicamente prohíbe el toreo y no afecta los otros 3 tipos de espectáculos con animales: el coleo, las corralejas y las peleas de gallos. title: Facu Campazzo rey de España: se consagró con el Real Madrid en la Liga ACB
creator: Marcelo Chaijale
content: Facundo Campazzo es el rey de España. En su temporada de regreso al Real Madrid tras su paso por la NBA y en el Estrella Roja de Serbia, el cordobés fue el líder de la casa blanca que se quedó con los tres título en juego en el país. Con Campazzo como figura, el Madrid fue campeón esta campaña en la Súper Copa de España, la Copa del Rey y la cerró con la Liga Española ACB. title: Julio Frenk takes charge at UCLA: What his appointment means for the Bruins (and college sports on the West Coast)

title: Corus says Global News 'changes' affect jobs, won't disclose how many
creator: The Canadian Press
content: TORONTO - Corus Entertainment Inc. says it has “made some changes” at Global News, citing the same headwinds that have led to massive cuts at other media outlets. Global News spokeswoman Anna Arnone says the move comes as part of an ongoing evaluation of its business and an efficiency review across Corus. She says Global News is continuously working to improve content production and delivery but declined to offer further details, such as whether employees had been laid off, though she said...

title: பள்ளிகளில் மாணவர்கள் மன அழுத்தம் இன்றி கற்பதை உறுதி செய்ய வேண்டும்: கலெக்டர்களுக்கு தலைமை செயலாளர் கடிதம்
content: சென்னை: தமிழ்நாட்டில் உள்ள பள்ளிகளில் கற்பிக்கப்படுவதையும், மாணவர்கள் மன அழுத்தம் இல்லாமல் கற்றுக்கொள்வதையும் மாவட்ட ஆட்சியர்கள் உறுதி செய்ய வேண்டும் என மாவட்ட ஆட்சியர்களுக்கு தலைமைச் செயலாளர் சிவ்தாஸ் மீனா கடிதம் எழுதியுள்ளார்.இதுகுறித்து தலைமை செயலாளர் சிவ்தாஸ் மீனா, மாவட்ட ஆட்சியர்களுக்கு அனுப்பியுள்ள வழிகாட்டு நெறிமுறைகள் கடிதம்: கல்விமுறை மற்றும் தரத்தை மேம்படுத்துவது தொடர்பாக மாவட்ட அளவிலான ஆய்வுக் கூட்டம் நடத்த வேண்டும். பள்ளிகளில் கற்பிக்கப்படுவதையும், மாணவர்கள் மன அழுத்தம் இல்லாமல்...

title: Игры БРИКС церемония открытия
Participa en el concurso de reciclaje “EcoVecino” 2024
creator: Nancy De León
content: El Gobierno Municipal, a través de la Dirección de Desarrollo Humano y Educación, invita a los comités de vecinos a participar en el concurso de reciclaje “EcoVecino”, en donde los participantes contribuirán en la protección y sustentabilidad del medio ambiente a través de la recolección y canje de materiales reciclables. title: Vikings: Valhalla season 3 — release date, trailer, cast and everything we know about the historical action series
creator: michael.balderston@futurenet.com (Michael Balderston)
content: Skol! The hit series is returning for another season in 2024, set to mark the final journey for the historical action series. And we've got everything you need to know about season 3 right here. Created by Jeb Stuart, has told the story Leif Eriksson, Harald Sigurdsson and Freydis Eriksdotter and how each of them becomes three of the most famous Vikings in history. title: Rehén israelí sufrió "castigos" durante ocho meses de cautiverio a manos de Hamas, según su familia
creator: Alexandra Ferguson
content: (CNN) -- La familia de uno de los rehenes rescatados en una operación israelí el fin de semana declaró que sufrió maltrato psicológico a manos de sus captores de Hamas durante los ocho meses que permaneció retenido en Gaza. Andrey Kozlov, de 27 años, fue rescatado el sábado junto a Noa Argamani, Almog Meir Jan y Shlomi Ziv durante una incursión en el campo de refugiados de Nuseirat, en el centro de Gaza. La operación fue solo el tercer rescate israelí de rehenes retenidos en Gaza y...

title: Multiple people shot in northern Illinois community, authorities say
creator: Associated Press
content: DIXON, Ill. — Multiple people were shot Wednesday in a community in northern Illinois, authorities said. Ambulances and two medical helicopters went to the Lost Lake community near Dixon, where there also was a massive police presence, according to a post on the Winnebago Boone & Ogle County Fire/Ems Incidents Facebook page. A spokesperson at Katherine Shaw Bethea Hospital in Dixon said three people were taken to the hospital’s emergency department, two of whom were treated and released. The...

title: New Mayor Pro Tem and Deputy Mayor Pro Tem appointed by Dallas City Council
content: DALLAS — The Dallas City Council appointed Councilmember Tennell Atkins as the new Mayor Pro Tem and Councilmember Adam Bazaldua as Deputy Mayor Pro Tem on Wednesday. According to the city, these one-year appointments will take effect on June 17. Atkins, who represents District 8, was elected back in 2017. Currently, Atkins serves as the Chair of the Economic Development Committee, Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions and Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs, according to the city. The city says...

title: El Madrid se corona
creator: Ricardo González
content: No fue una final al uso, con el rey del palmarés, el Real Madrid, agarrando fuerte su Liga número 37 frente a un adversario increíble, que había tumbado al Valencia y al Unicaja en todos los partidos a domicilio, pero que no tenía pedigrí de éxitos. El UCAM quería ser el octavo pasajero, el octavo equipo en inscribir su nombre como campeón liguero. title: محافظ البنك المركزي: عملنا على تكوين حزمة إجراءات تتعلق بالتضخم ونقص العملة الصعبة
content: قال حسن عبدالله، محافظ البنك المركزي المصري، إن البنك عمل على تكوين حزمة كاملة من الإجراءات التي قد تصنف بأنها مؤلمة، وتتعلق بالتضخم وتوقعاته، ونقص العملة الصعبة، وبيئة الأعمال،وكان من الضروري أن تجري كل تلك الإجراءات المالية بنوع من التناغم، مع التعامل مع الاحتياجات الأساسية للأفراد ذوي الدخل المحدود. وأوضح عبدالله: «فعلنا ذلك في مصر ونفعل المزيد من اجل حسن التوجه لتلك الفئات من خلال برنامج تكافل وكرامة،وبرامج أخرى تستهدف فئات وأسر محددة بالدعم». وأضاف «عبدالله»، في كلمته بجلسة...

title: Američki novinar: Rusija nije pozvana na 80. godišnjicu iskrcavanja saveznika u Normandiji zbog SAD
content: On je istakao da je stradanje više od 20 miliona ruskih muškaraca i žena tokom Drugog svetskog rata „više nego dovoljno da se Rusiji obezbedi mesto“. Ranije je koordinator za strateške komunikacije u Odboru za nacionalnu bezbednost Bele kuće Džon Kirbi izjavio da SAD nemaju veze sa odlukom Francuske da ne pozove Rusiju na obeležavanje godišnjice iskrcavanja saveznika u Drugom svetskom ratu u Normandiji. title: Амерички новинар: Русија није позвана на 80. годишњицу искрцавања савезника у Нормандији због САД
content: Он је истакао да је страдање више од 20 милиона руских мушкараца и жена током Другог светског рата „више него довољно да се Русији обезбеди место“. Раније је координатор за стратешке комуникације у Одбору за националну безбедност Беле куће Џон Кирби изјавио да САД немају везе са одлуком Француске да не позове Русију на обележавање годишњице искрцавања савезника у Другом светском рату у Нормандији. title: مهرجان جرش... معا لتكريس سيرورة الحضارة بيان صادر عن رئيس اللجنة العليا لمهرجان المسرح الحر
creator: محمد ملكاوي
content: وطنا اليوم_بقلم _ مهرجان جرش.. كانت عيوننا حينها في جرش المهرجان، وفي جرش الوعي والحضور البهي، وفي جرش السيرة والسيرورة، عينا أثقلتها النوائب فأحمر قلبها من شدة الجرح، وأخرى تخبئ في موقفها الحزين جذوة فرحا لتنفخ عليها بدمعة، وثالثة يرف جفنها كلما سمعت بنشوة نصر غرب سور الوهم... إنها عيوننا التي ميزنا بها الخبيث من الطيب، عيوننا التي نرسم فيها مسارات الفرح كما هي مرسومة لمسارات الحزن، فهل نفقأ القلب كي يستمر الحزن ويهزل الفرح وننوء بحملنا؟ أبدا، وأبدا... أشعلوا مواسم المحبّة في مواجهة...

title: Millions of Amazon Prime members can download free video games and dozens of freebies with easy-to-miss perk trick
creator: Debbie White
content: AMAZON Prime members have access to free video games plus scores of freebies. But some subscribers might be missing out on the fun. Prime membership includes free video games and in-game content at no additional cost. "Specifically, Prime Gaming offers access to tons of free content for PC, console, and mobile games," said Amazon. content: Bahnt sich in der Formel 1 eine Überraschung an? 17-Jähriger wird offenbar Hamilton-Nachfolger Die Suche nach einem Nachfolger für Lewis Hamilton bei Mercedes biegt auf die Zielgeraden ein. content: Help is direly needed in Emmerdale as Belle Dingle continues to endure Tom King's controlling and abusive behaviour - but could Wendy Posner be the one to set her free? title: House votes to hold Attorney General Merrick Garland in contempt for withholding Biden audio
creator: Caitlin Yilek
content: Washington — The House voted Wednesday to hold Attorney General Merrick Garland in contempt of Congress , escalating a fight over audio recordings related to the President Biden's handling of classified documents. Garland has defied subpoenas from the Republican-led House Judiciary and Oversight committees demanding that the Justice Department hand over the audiotapes of the president's interview with special counsel Robert Hur as part of their impeachment inquiry. content: At this point, Charli XCX should just officiate Matty Healy and Gabbriette Bechtel’s wedding. title: Barcelona: Byron Castillo regresa a su eterno amor

content: Desde que salió de Barcelona, el amor de los hinchas y también del jugador Byron Castillo para que regrese nunca se ha escondido.
